pattern.name: task_delegation_prompt
pattern.usage: This template is used to generate the prompt when delegating a task to the `code` mode.

pattern.name: task_status_update
pattern.usage: This shows how to update the `tasks.md` file to mark a task as complete.
pattern.template: <<<<<<< SEARCH - [ ] 1.1. Create the main component file `MyComponent.jsx`. ======= - [x] 1.1. Create the main component file `MyComponent.jsx`. >>>>>>> REPLACE

pattern.name: revision_request
pattern.usage: This template is for creating a new sub-task when a code review fails and a revision is needed.
pattern.template: <<<<<<< SEARCH - [x] 2. Implement the core logic. ======= - [x] 2. Implement the core logic. - [ ] 2.1. **REVISION:** {Brief description of what needs to be fixed.} - {Detailed feedback from the code review.} >>>>>>> REPLACE
